name: Introduction to Filipino Cuisine
description: Discover the rich and diverse flavors of Filipino cuisine, from adobo to sinigang, in this introductory course.

name: Regional Filipino Dishes
description: Explore the unique regional dishes of the Philippines, including Bicol Express and Cebu Lechon.

name: Filipino Street Food Favorites
description: Learn how to make popular Filipino street foods, such as fish balls and kwek kwek, in this fun and interactive course.

name: Vegetarian Filipino Cuisine
description: Discover delicious and healthy vegetarian Filipino dishes, such as tofu sisig and ginataang langka.

name: Filipino Desserts and Pastries
description: Learn how to make traditional Filipino sweets, like bibingka and turon, as well as modern desserts with a Filipino twist.

name: Advanced Filipino Cooking Techniques
description: Take your Filipino cooking skills to the next level with advanced techniques, such as sous vide and molecular gastronomy.
